meanings: express[announce, indicate, state] one's intention to resign

vlive.korean: [본인 공식 입장 표명] 모두가 재밌었다면... Everyone had a fun time. 듣기 View video AB6IX : AB6IX (에이비식스) 여행은 기록왕
입장 표명 하는 거예요? Are you expressing your stance now? 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 우리 우정 Forever💙
vlive.english: Are you expressing your stance now?

vlive.korean: 빨리 입장 표명 좀 해주세요. 왜 저렇게 예쁘죠? Please explain. Why are you so pretty? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [FULL] NCT 127 SHOWCASE 'CHERRY BOMB'
vlive.english: Please explain. Why are you so pretty?

vlive.korean: 경찰 조사를 성실하게 받겠다고 이미 입장 표명을 한 상태예요. He announced that he'd welcome police investigations. 듣기 View video 10PM : 월요일 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 A night's entertainment news
vlive.english: He announced that he'd welcome police investigations.

vlive.korean: Hong 감독의 부인이 입장을 표명했으니까... Because Director. Hong's wife expressed her position... 듣기 View video 10PM : 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 A night's entertainment news
vlive.english: Because Director. Hong's wife expressed her position...

examples.korean: They intend to bring their complaints out into the open. 발음듣기 그들은 자신들의 불만 사항을 공개적으로 표명할 의도이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They intend to bring their complaints out into the open. 발음

examples.korean: China has registered a protest over foreign intervention. 발음듣기 중국은 외국의 개입에 대해 항의 의사를 표명했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: China has registered a protest over foreign intervention. 발음

examples.korean: Some manifestation of your concern would have been appreciated. 발음듣기 당신의 우려를 표명해 주었더라면 고맙게 받아들였을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some manifestation of your concern would have been appreciated. 발음

examples.korean: to pronounce an opinion 발음듣기 의견을 표명하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
I would have to state my strong objection to your proposal. 발음듣기 귀하의 제안에 대해 강력한 반대 입장을 표명해야겠네요. DARAKWON
examples.english: I would have to state my strong objection to your proposal. 발음
